 2012-11502012-09-27,  ,  HC,  , 
ActDepartment of Health Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Potable Water Regulations for Common Carriers
PrecisRegulations Amending the POTABLE WATER REGULATIONS FOR COMMON CARRIERS in order to enable officials from the amalgamated program at the Public Health Agency of Canada to carry out their duties under the Regulations once designated as inspectors by the Minister of Health.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0201 Publication Date: 2012-10-10
